page.title: 01A Review of our Area
page.content: Our area is mostly{farmland}and the fields merge to create Nature's own patchwork quilt. Many of the farmers have uprooted hedges,thus forming larger fields.The whole panorama is dotted with farms and in the distance we can see the woodlands of{Sandbeck {Estate.Lord Scarbrough}used to own most of the land,and although he has sold many acres,he retains a large proportion.Interesting features in our area include the{Friary,Sandbeck Hall, the{Milldam}and the remains of the{ {Castle.}The{Friary}is a private home; it incorporates a 13th century lancet window and other masonry from the original Friary,which housed friars until 1538.Locals and visitors find the{Milldam}an attraction.They feed the ducks,sail radio controlled boats or just simply relax and enjoy the scenery.
